extensionDescription.message: Data protection has never been so easy. Official webextension for MetaGer.

searchProviderName.description: Name of the search provider to be installed in the browser

searchProviderHost.description: Host of the search provider to be installed in the browser

settings_title.description: Title Metatag on the settings page

settings_store_settings_heading.description: Heading for Setting storage by plugin

settings_store_settings_description.message: The extension saves the search settings so that they are no longer lost when the history is deleted.
settings_store_settings_description.description: Heading for Setting storage by plugin

settings_store_settings_link.description: Link description to the MetaGer settings page

settings_anonymous_tokens_heading.description: Heading for Setting anonymous token by plugin

settings_anonymous_tokens_description.message: When enabling this feature you can use a MetaGer key verifiable completely anonymous using homomorphic encryption. This algorithm makes it impossible for us to connect a MetaGer Key with any search request you make.
settings_anonymous_tokens_description.description: Heading for Setting storage by plugin

settings_inkognito.message: Your MetaGer settings will not be applied in inkognito tabs. If you want to change this you can allow this extension to run in those.
